content: क्षेम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्षि-मन् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 138</ls>] {@--1@} Conferring happiness, ease or comfort, good, beneficial, well; धार्तराष्ट्रा रणे हन्युस्तन्मे क्षेमतरं भवेत् <ls>Bg. 1. 46.</ls> {@--2@} Prosperous, at ease, comfortable, {@--3@} Secure, happy. --मः, --मं {@--1@} Peace, happiness, ease, welfare, wellbeing; वितन्वति क्षेममदेवमातृकाश्चिराय तास्मिन् कुरवश्चकासते <ls>Ki. 1. 17</ls>; वैश्यं क्षेमं समागम्य (पृच्छेत्) <ls>Ms. 2. 127</ls>; अधुना सर्वजलचराणां क्षेमं भविष्यति <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Safety, security; क्षेमेण व्रज बांधवान् <ls>Mk. 7. 7</ls> safely; <ls>Pt. 1. 146.</ls> {@--3@} Preserving, protection; <ls>R. 15. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Keeping what is acquired; <ab>cf.</ab> योगक्षेम. {@--5@} Final beatitude, eternal happiness. {@--6@} Basis, foundation. {@--7@} Residence, resting-place. {@--8@} A star, asterism (नक्षत्र). --मः A kind of perfume. --मा An epithet of Durgā.
